transcript:
and not hanging to a woman's apron strings. The Service before everything. Thanks, thanks!" And he went on writing, so that his quill spluttered and squeaked. "If you have anything to say, say it. These two things can be done together," he added. 
"About my wife ... I am ashamed as it is to leave her on your hands. . . ." 
"Why talk nonsense? Say what you want." 
"When her confinement is due, send to Moscow for an accoucheur. . . . Let him be here " 
The old prince stopped writing
